Question
========
  
In a single-factor study with four groups, if the results are analyzed using a 1-way ANOVA, you can be sure that: 
Answerlist
----------
* A number of independent t-tests were done first
* It is a repeated-measures design
* Post hoc tests are required if the result of the ANOVA is significant
* The independent variable has at least 5 levels.
